msg: On the fsfs-format7 branch:  allow for containerized representations to be
longer than SVN_DELTA_WINDOW_SIZE.  For that, we must be able to extract

author: gstein
msg: As pointed out on-list, the observed problem (so far) is with reverse
proxies, not forward proxies. We shouldn't key on whether we're using
